short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block websites or your social media homepage feed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Block feed from the homepage of the supported platforms. All other aspects of the platforms are unaffected.

The supported platforms are listed in the second screenshot.

You are also able to block any website in its entirety.

𝐅𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞𝐬:
✓ Toggle all feeds on or off.

✓ Toggle individual feeds on or off.

✓ Block any website in its entirety.

𝐇𝐨𝐰 𝐭𝐨 𝐔𝐬𝐞 𝐁𝐥𝐨𝐜𝐤𝐢𝐟𝐲: After installing Blockify, pin it to your browser.

𝐇𝐨𝐰 𝐭𝐨 𝐁𝐥𝐨𝐜𝐤 𝐚 𝐖𝐞𝐛𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐞:
Type any domain in the input bar. Press enter. The website will appear in the Blocked Domains list.

𝐇𝐨𝐰 𝐭𝐨 𝐔𝐧𝐛𝐥𝐨𝐜𝐤 𝐚 𝐖𝐞𝐛𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐞:
Press the remove button next to a website in the Blocked Domains list.

𝐇𝐨𝐰 𝐭𝐨 𝐁𝐥𝐨𝐜𝐤 𝐅𝐞𝐞𝐝𝐬:
1.) Turn on the main switch. 𝐓𝐡𝐢𝐬 𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐩 𝐢𝐬 𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐲 𝐢𝐦𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐚𝐧𝐭.

2.) Turn on feed blocking for individual platforms.

𝐈𝐟 𝐘𝐨𝐮 𝐄𝐧𝐜𝐨𝐮𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫 𝐚 𝐁𝐮𝐠:
✓ Make sure to turn on the main switch before you turn on other switches.

✓ Turn the main switch off and on a few times.

✓ Refresh the webpage.

✓ Visit chrome://extensions. Refresh Blockify.

𝐈𝐟 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐛𝐮𝐠 𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐬, 𝐩𝐥𝐞𝐚𝐬𝐞 𝐬𝐮𝐛𝐦𝐢𝐭 𝐚 𝐛𝐮𝐠 𝐫𝐞𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭. 𝐈 𝐰𝐢𝐥𝐥 𝐬𝐪𝐮𝐚𝐬𝐡 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐛𝐮𝐠 𝐚𝐬𝐚𝐩!

𝐒𝐮𝐩𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭 𝐖𝐞𝐛𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐞: https://abdullahhamid.ca/blockify/blockify-oninstall.html

𝐑𝐞𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐮𝐬𝐞𝐫? 𝐑𝐞𝐚𝐝 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐂𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐠𝐞 𝐋𝐨𝐠.
